scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node-dev --inspect=3501 -r dotenv-vault-core/config src/server.ts dotenv_config_path=../../.env.vault
scripts.start-nobuild: cross-env NODE_ENV=develÏ€opment node --inspect=3501 -r esbuild-register -r dotenv-vault-core/config src/server.ts dotenv_config_path=../../.env.vault
scripts.start: cd server-build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --optimize_for_size --max_old_space_size=920 --gc_interval=100 -r tsconfig-paths/register src/server.js
